elements.expression:
image dataurl={asset "asset-49338e71-4d58-43f0-8dfa-cc95cd951432"} mode="contain"
| render containerStyle={containerStyle opacity="0.1"}

filters
| essql query="SELECT ansible_distribution AS Distribution FROM \"ansible_cache\""
| pointseries x="Distribution" y="size(Distribution)" color="size(Distribution)" text="size(Distribution)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75} legend=false
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown 
  "### Summary 

This Report is a summary of all systems that are managed by Ansible" 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=24 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render containerStyle={containerStyle opacity="1"}

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
\"ansible_local.support-info.Banner\" AS Banner
FROM \"ansible_cache\"
order by Banner ASC"
| pointseries x="Banner" y="size(Banner)" color="size(Banner)" text="size(Banner)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75} legend=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT \"ansible_local.support-info.Location\" AS Location
FROM \"ansible_cache\" 
Order BY Location DESC"
| pointseries x="size(Location)" y="Location" color="Location"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 horizontalBars=true} legend=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT SUBSTRING(ansible_product_name,0,30) AS ProductName 
FROM \"ansible_cache\" 
Order BY ProductName DESC"
| pointseries x="size(ProductName)" y="ProductName" color="ProductName" text="size(ProductName)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 horizontalBars=true} legend=false
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
LCASE(\"ansible_hostname\") AS \"Hostname\",
\"ansible_distribution\" AS \"Distribution\",
\"ansible_distribution_version\" AS \"Version\",
\"ansible_architecture\" AS \"Arch\",
\"ansible_product_serial\" AS \"Serial\",
\"ansible_product_name\" AS \"ProductName\",
\"ansible_kernel\" AS \"Kernel\",
\"ansible_memtotal_mb\" AS \"TotalMemory\",
\"ansible_processor_cores\" AS \"CoreCount\",
\"ansible_processor_count\" AS \"ProcessorCount\",
\"ansible_processor_vcpus\" AS \"VCPUsCount\"
 FROM \"ansible_cache\"
order by Hostname  ASC"
|table showHeader=true perPage=100 paginate=true 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
|render 
  containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid " borderRadius="20px" overflow="visible"}

filters
| essql query="SELECT ansible_distribution AS Distribution FROM \"ansible_cache\""
| pointseries x="Distribution" y="size(Distribution)" color="size(Distribution)" text="size(Distribution)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75} legend=false
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT ansible_distribution AS Distribution FROM \"ansible_cache\""
| math "size(Distribution)"
| metric "Total Systems" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="center" color="#1785b0" weight="bold" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
LCASE(\"ansible_hostname\") AS \"Hostname\",
\"ansible_local.support-info.Banner\" AS Banner,
\"ansible_local.support-info.ServerOwner\" As Notify
 FROM \"ansible_cache\"
order by Hostname  ASC"
| table showHeader=true perPage=100 paginate=true 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render 
  containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid " borderRadius="20px" overflow="visible"}

| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75} legend=false
